verses.verse: בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he חָלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> fell sick אֲבִיָּ֥ה <S%H29><s%> Abijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יָרָבְעָ֜ם <S%H3379><s%> And Jeroboam לְאִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> to his wife ק֤וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now וְהִשְׁתַּנִּ֔ית <S%H8138><s%> I pray thee and disguise וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יֵֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> thyself that thou be not known כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for [אַתִּי כ] (אַ֖תְּ <S%H859><s%> you ק) אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> to be the wife יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam וְהָלַ֣כְתְּ <S%H1980><s%> and get שִׁלֹ֗ה <S%H7887><s%> thee to Shiloh הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> is there אֲחִיָּ֣ה <S%H281><s%> behold there [is] Ahijah הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> who דִבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> which told עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> concerning לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> me that [I should be] king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> over this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְלָקַ֣חַתְּ <S%H3947><s%> And take בְּ֠יָדֵךְ <S%H3027><s%> with thee עֲשָׂרָ֨ה <S%H6235><s%> ten לֶ֧חֶם <S%H3899><s%> loaves וְנִקֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5350><s%> and cracknels וּבַקְבֻּ֥ק <S%H1228><s%> and a cruse דְּבַ֖שׁ <S%H1706><s%> of honey וּבָ֣את <S%H935><s%> and go אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> to him he shall tell לָ֔ךְ מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will happen לַנָּֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> thee what shall become of the child

וַתַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did so כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife יָרָבְעָ֔ם <S%H3379><s%> And Jeroboam's וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> and arose וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> to Shiloh וַתָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֲחִיָּ֑ה <S%H281><s%> of Ahijah וַאֲחִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H281><s%> But Ahijah לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָכֹ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> could לִרְא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> not see כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for קָ֥מוּ <S%H6965><s%> were set עֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> for his eyes מִשֵּׂיבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7869><s%> by reason of his age ס

וַיהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning אֲחִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H281><s%> unto Ahijah הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> Behold the wife יָרָבְעָ֡ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> cometh לִדְרֹשׁ֩ <S%H1875><s%> to ask דָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> a thing מֵעִמְּךָ֤ <S%H5973><s%> of you אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning בְּנָהּ֙ <S%H1121><s%> of thee for her son כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חֹלֶ֣ה <S%H2470><s%> for he [is] sick ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כָּזֹ֥ה <S%H2090><s%> thus וְכָזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> and thus תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and thus shalt thou say אֵלֶ֑יהָ <S%H413><s%> concerning וִיהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כְבֹאָ֔הּ <S%H935><s%> unto her for it shall be when she cometh in וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> herself מִתְנַכֵּרָֽה׃ <S%H5234><s%> that she shall feign herself [to be] another

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֲחִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H281><s%> And it was [so] when Ahijah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound רַגְלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H7272><s%> of her feet בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> as she came in בַפֶּ֔תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> that he said בֹּ֖אִי <S%H935><s%> Come in אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> thou wife יָרָבְעָ֑ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why זֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> he אַ֚תְּ <S%H859><s%> you מִתְנַכֵּרָ֔ה <S%H5234><s%> why feignest thou thyself [to be] another וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <S%H595><s%> I שָׁל֥וּחַ <S%H7971><s%> ? for I [am] sent אֵלַ֖יִךְ <S%H413><s%> to you קָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7186><s%> to thee [with] heavy

לְכִ֞י <S%H1980><s%> Go אִמְרִ֣י <S%H559><s%> tell לְיָרָבְעָ֗ם <S%H3379><s%> Jeroboam כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Forasmuch as אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I הֲרִימֹתִ֖יךָ <S%H7311><s%> I exalted מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> thee from among הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וָאֶתֶּנְךָ֣ <S%H5414><s%> and made נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> thee prince עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וָאֶקְרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וָאֶתְּנֶ֖הָ <S%H5414><s%> and gave לָ֑ךְ וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הָיִ֜יתָ <S%H1961><s%> been כְּעַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> it thee and [yet] thou hast not been as my servant דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who שָׁמַ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> who kept מִצְוֹתַ֜י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments וַאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and who הָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרַי֙ <S%H310><s%> with בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> me with all his heart לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do רַ֖ק <S%H7535><s%> that הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> [that] only [which was] right בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> in mine eyes

וַתָּ֣רַע <S%H7489><s%> evil לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> But hast done מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> above all that were before וַתֵּ֡לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> gone וַתַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and made לְּךָ֩ אֱלֹהִ֨ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֤ים <S%H312><s%> thee other וּמַסֵּכוֹת֙ <S%H4541><s%> and molten images לְהַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <S%H3707><s%> to provoke me to anger וְאֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> הִשְׁלַ֖כְתָּ <S%H7993><s%> and hast cast אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> me behind גַוֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H1458><s%> thy back ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> Therefore behold I will bring רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house יָרָבְעָ֔ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> and will cut off לְיָֽרָבְעָם֙ <S%H3379><s%> from Jeroboam מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <S%H8366><s%> him that pisseth בְּקִ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> against the wall עָצ֥וּר <S%H6113><s%> [and] him that is shut up וְעָז֖וּב <S%H5800><s%> and left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel וּבִֽעַרְתִּי֙ <S%H1197><s%> and will take away אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> the remnant בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יָרָבְעָ֔ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יְבַעֵ֥ר <S%H1197><s%> as a man taketh away הַגָּלָ֖ל <S%H1557><s%> dung עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֻּמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H8552><s%> till it be all gone

הַמֵּ֨ת <S%H4191><s%> Him that dieth לְיָֽרָבְעָ֤ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam בָּעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> in the city יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> eat הַכְּלָבִ֔ים <S%H3611><s%> shall the dogs וְהַמֵּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> and him that dieth בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field יֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> eat ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> shall the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken

וְאַ֥תְּ <S%H859><s%> now you ק֖וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise לְכִ֣י <S%H1980><s%> go לְבֵיתֵ֑ךְ <S%H1004><s%> thee to thine own house בְּבֹאָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> enter רַגְלַ֛יִךְ <S%H7272><s%> [and] when thy feet הָעִ֖ירָה <S%H5892><s%> into the city וּמֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> shall die הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <S%H3206><s%> the child

וְסָֽפְדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> shall mourn ל֤וֹ כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And all Israel וְקָבְר֣וּ <S%H6912><s%> for him and bury אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> he לְבַדּ֔וֹ <S%H905><s%> alone יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall come לְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> him for he only of Jeroboam אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward קָ֑בֶר <S%H6913><s%> to the grave יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> because נִמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> because in him there is found ב֞וֹ דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [some] good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> toward the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam

וְהֵקִים֩ <S%H6965><s%> shall raise him up יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Moreover the LORD ל֥וֹ מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> a king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יַכְרִ֛ית <S%H3772><s%> who shall cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יָרָבְעָ֖ם <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day וּמֶ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> how long גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> and from עָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> now

וְהִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> shall smite יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָנ֣וּד <S%H5110><s%> is shaken הַקָּנֶה֮ <S%H7070><s%> as a reed בַּמַּיִם֒ <S%H4325><s%> in the water וְנָתַ֣שׁ <S%H5428><s%> and he shall root up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel מֵ֠עַל <S%H5921><s%> and הָאֲדָמָ֨ה <S%H127><s%> land הַטּוֹבָ֤ה <S%H2896><s%> out of this good הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> which he gave לַאֲב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> to their fathers וְזֵרָ֖ם <S%H2219><s%> and shall scatter מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> them beyond לַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> the river יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> because they have made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֵׁ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H842><s%> their groves מַכְעִיסִ֖ים <S%H3707><s%> to anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> provoking the LORD

וְיִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel בִּגְלַ֞ל <S%H1558><s%> because חַטֹּ֤אות <S%H2403><s%> of the sins יָֽרָבְעָם֙ <S%H3379><s%> of Jeroboam אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> who did sin וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶחֱטִ֖יא <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and who made Israel

וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> arose אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife יָרָבְעָ֔ם <S%H3379><s%> And Jeroboam's וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and departed וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> and came תִרְצָ֑תָה <S%H8656><s%> to Tirzah הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> she בָּאָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> [and] when she came בְסַף־ <S%H5592><s%> to the threshold הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the door וְהַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> the child מֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> died

וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> And they buried אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> mourned ל֖וֹ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> him and all Israel כִּדְבַ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> for him according to the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand עַבְדּ֖וֹ <S%H5650><s%> of his servant אֲחִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H281><s%> Ahijah הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet
